section.p: The audio mode is enabled by default.

ul.li: This method affects the internal engine and can be called after the \ref agora::rtc::IRtcEngine::leaveChannel "leaveChannel" method. It is still valid after.

This method enables the audio module and takes some time to take effect. Agora recommends using the following API methods to control the audio module separately:
: Whether to start microphone collection and create a local audio stream.
Stops or resumes sending the local audio stream.
: Whether to receive and play the remote audio stream.
: Whether to receive and play all remote audio streams.
